mapper.select: SELECT A.FXA_INFO_ID as 'fxaInfoId' /*고정자산 정보 ID*/ , A.FXA_NM as 'fxaNm' /*고정자산 명*/ , A.FXA_NO as 'fxaNo' /*고정자산 번호*/ , A.WBS_CD as 'wbsCd' /*WBS 코드*/ , A.PRJ_CD as 'prjCd' /*PJT 코드*/ , VSD.PRJ_NM as 'prjNm' /*프로젝트명(소속명)*/ , dbo.fn_getSabunName(CRGR_ID) as 'crgrNm' /*담당자명*/ , A.FXA_LOC as 'fxaLoc' /*고정자산 위치*/ , A.FXA_QTY as 'fxaQty' /*고정자산 수량*/ , A.FXA_UTM_NM as 'fxaUtmNm' /*고정자산 단위 명*/ , A.OBT_PCE as 'obtPce' /*취득가*/ , A.BKP_PCE as 'bkpPce' /*장부가*/ , A.OBT_DT as 'obtDt' /*취득일(YYYY-MM-DD)*/ , A.RLIS_DT as 'rlisDt' /*실사일*/ , ISNULL(A.TAG_YN,'N') as 'tagYn' /*태그 여부*/ , A.IMG_FIL_PATH as 'imgFilPath' /*이미지 FILE PATH*/ , A.IMG_FIL_NM as 'imgFilNm' /*이미지 FILE 명*/ , A.ATTC_FIL_ID as 'attcFilId' /*파일ID*/ , F.SEQ as 'attcFilSeq' /*파일시퀀스*/ , F.FIL_NM as 'attcFilNm' /*파일명*/ , F.FIL_PATH as 'attcFilPath'/*파일위치*/ , F.FIL_SIZE as 'attcFilSize'/*파일사이즈*/ FROM IRIS_FXA_INFO_MST A LEFT OUTER JOIN IRIS_PRJ_RSST_MST VSD ON A.WBS_CD = VSD.WBS_CD LEFT OUTER JOIN IRIS_COM_ATTC_FIL F ON F.ATTC_FIL_ID = A.ATTC_FIL_ID AND F.DEL_YN = 'N' WHERE 1=1 AND A.WBS_CD = #{wbsCd} AND A.FXA_ST_CD = 'USE'

SELECT A.FXA_INFO_ID as 'fxaInfoId' /*고정자산 정보 ID*/ , A.FXA_NM as 'fxaNm' /*고정자산 명*/ , A.FXA_NO as 'fxaNo' /*고정자산 번호*/ , A.FXA_ST_CD as 'fxaStCd' /*고정자산 상태 코드*/ , A.WBS_CD as 'wbsCd' /*WBS 코드*/ , VSD.TEAM_DEPT_NAME as "prjNm" , A.CRGR_ID as 'crgrId' /*담당자 ID*/ , dbo.fn_getSabunName(CRGR_ID) as 'crgrNm' /*담당자명*/ , A.FXA_LOC as 'fxaLoc' /*고정자산 위치*/ , A.FXA_CLSS as 'fxaClss' /*고정자산 클래스*/ , A.FXA_QTY as 'fxaQty' /*고정자산 수량*/ , A.FXA_UTM_NM as 'fxaUtmNm' /*고정자산 단위 명*/ , A.OBT_PCE as 'obtPce' /*취득가*/ , A.BKP_PCE as 'bkpPce' /*장부가*/ , A.OBT_DT as 'obtDt' /*취득일(YYYY-MM-DD)*/ , A.RLIS_DT as 'rlisDt' /*실사일*/ , A.DSU_DT as 'dsuDt' /*폐기일*/ , A.MK_NM as 'mkNm' /*Maker 명*/ , A.USE_USF as 'useUsf' /*사용 용도*/ , ISNULL(A.TAG_YN,'N') as 'tagYn' /*태그 여부*/ , A.PRC_DPT as 'prcDpt' /*구입처*/ , A.FXA_SPC as 'fxaSpc' /*고정자산 SPECIFICATION*/ , A.IMG_FIL_PATH as 'imgFilPath' /*이미지 FILE PATH*/ , A.IMG_FIL_NM as 'imgFilNm' /*이미지 FILE 명*/ , A.DEL_YN as 'delYn' /*삭제여부*/ , A.ATTC_FIL_ID as 'attcFilId' /*파일ID*/ , F.SEQ as 'attcFilSeq' /*파일시퀀스*/ , F.FIL_NM as 'attcFilNm' /*파일명*/ , F.FIL_PATH as 'attcFilPath'/*파일위치*/ , F.FIL_SIZE as 'attcFilSize'/*파일사이즈*/ FROM IRIS_FXA_INFO_MST A LEFT OUTER JOIN IRIS_SSO_USER D ON D.SA_SABUN_NEW = A.CRGR_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN VW_SSO_DEPT VSD ON D.sa_dept_new = VSD.DEPT_CODE LEFT OUTER JOIN IRIS_COM_ATTC_FIL F ON F.ATTC_FIL_ID = A.ATTC_FIL_ID AND F.DEL_YN = 'N' WHERE 1=1 AND A.FXA_INFO_ID = #{fxaInfoId}

SELECT DISTINCT D.TEAM_DEPT_NAME AS "prjNm" , B.WBS_CD AS "wbsCd" , SA_SABUN_NEW AS "saSabun" , SA_DEPT_NEW AS "saDeptCd" , SA_DEPT_NAME AS "saDeptName" , SA_NAME AS "saName" , SA_JOBX AS "saJobx" , SA_JOBX_NAME AS "saJobxName" , D.TEAM_DEPT_CODE AS "deptCd" FROM IRIS_SSO_USER A INNER JOIN VW_SSO_DEPT D ON D.DEPT_CODE = A.SA_DEPT_NEW AND A.SSO_EX_FLAG != 'D' LEFT OUTER JOIN IRIS_PRJ_RSST_MST B ON B.DEPT_CD = D.DEPT_CODE WHERE 1=1 AND SA_GSBER = '1100'
AND A.SA_NAME LIKE '%'+#{userNm}+'%'
AND D.TEAM_DEPT_NAME LIKE '%'+#{teamNm}+'%'
